events.message: The customer reported an accident involving their car on Main Street, resulting in visible front-end damage and airbags deployed.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as the damage was caused to a vehicle in a collision.
An agent from the auto claims department has been assigned to handle the investigation and customer correspondence.
The customer was notified that the claim has been acknowledged and that the process will commence shortly.
Requested all relevant documentation including police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and driver's license copy.
The customer submitted the police report, photos of the collision, and proof of insurance as requested.
The claims department has started investigating the collision details and verifying submitted documents.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer's vehicle was damaged due to a third-party collision.
A settlement amount covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement was proposed to the customer.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the prompt processing.
The claim was officially approved based on the investigation outcome and agreed settlement terms.
The agreed settlement payment was issued to the customer's bank account for vehicle repairs and related expenses.
The claim case was closed after the payment issuance and completion of all claim processing steps.
The closed claim record was archived in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
